attributes.action: A council tax reveiw is long over due.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The goverment was supposed to The goverment was supposed to check and reband council tax in 2007 can  in 2007. Can they not do this as soon as possible. The bandings were done in an haphazared way in the first place so most banding are to high.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
